I've had so many abortions, I got addicted to them - Cartman

I like that the mother isn't just a mindless slut or brainless bimbo. What she is doing in the story is all properly thought out and done with a purpose. She is burning a strong sense of morality and principles into her son's mind at the cost of her own body + the babies being killed. It's a very dark story but makes perfect sense  why it plays out this way. Even as young as the son is, he has a small story arc of his own as he gradually starts to understand consequences more & more and even  attempts to exercise self-restraint. Yeah it fails but baby steps people
Wrf is this XD

A harsh lesson that is wasted on this selfish bastard. If there is a third part to this story, it's obvious that Mama is going to die because of his actions. Her body can't handle that many abortions. She's teaching him about consequences. A morality play within a porn story.

This shit is just annoyingly dramatic. I don't need porn to tell me Incest bad. This focuses way too much on the sex scenes and the sons logic to be a decent deconstruction. Both characters are fucking retarded, I feel so sorry for the father.
this is so dramatic stupid haha

I had to register an account just to comment on this. There are some seriously interesting character moments here! Some commenters are asking why she doesn't just use birth control, and I think the answer is she's punishing herself. She feels guilty for doing this with her son. The "lesson" about responsibility is also about her taking responsibility for doing something so immoral. This almost feels like a deconstruction of a lot of incest porn where the consequences, both emotionally and physically, are just glossed over or ignored.

Reread my comment and tell me when did i ever said or alluded to the mom doing nothing wrong.
Yes i did call out this annoying behaviour as mysoginistic because that's how it comes across to me. If you wanna pull the "its just porn bro ffs" then you have hundreds of thousands of other doujinshis that revolve purely on the sex (which i enjoy) but i consider to be really ignorant point to think that all authors put 0 effort in making a history.
There was another doujinshi called "Masterpiece" that followed an internet troll raping an underage girl and i think it was a great doujinshi even if it had rape and pedophilia in it. No, i'm not advocating for the human rights of a drawing and i never did. It was a cool story with an interesting plot to follow just like this story has.

The kid is a fucking POS because of his self centeredness, lack of discipline and he doesn't care.  I know it's just a toon, it is also a commentary on today's society no matter where one lives. I see the mother's reason for aborting to be some what extreme, but understandable. She's trying to discourage her son from lusting her and discourage the relationship that she foolishly thought was helping. Now her education has caused her son to be aggressive because of his desire for her. So she decided to give her son an ultimatum. Continue the incestuous relationship and she will always kill their unborn each time and that the abortion may damage her body. Of course he can't control his canal desire, and always cuts inside. But seeing the images of the next chapter shows that the mother's decision will have dire consequences that leads the son to go "bat shit crazy". I found this piece of the author work to be very surreal in some way. Exploring the dark aspect of a family fallen into lust of the fresh. That's just my thoughts. I hope you guys enjoy this stories I commissioned to be translated.
